title: Resume
text:

Name: Valdetaro, Mariana
Current role: Embedded Software Engineer in R&D | 
              5G Physical Layer at Nokia 
Previous role: Software Engineer Trainee in Applied R&D |
               Cloud and Networks at Nokia
Looking for: A Software Engineer role in STEM R&D
Why: looking for a new opportunity  to work:
            沐ｸwith impressive humans,
            沐ｸon hard problems,
            沐ｸtowards innovation and research.
Mobile: +351967409418 | E-mail: mvaldeta42@gmail.com | Location: Portugal, Europe

Tools
Standards




窶｢C  窶｢C++  窶｢bash  窶｢learning rust

窶｢best practices oriented  窶｢documentation  窶｢clean atomic code  窶｢sw life-cycle






Ten + years of working experience in different fields grant me:  沐ｸrapid adaptability to new methodologies,  沐ｸresponsability and autonony  沐ｸintrinsic awareness of time management : delivery, team dynamics and workflow.
